item.title: Packaging
item.description:
Make sure you use real Sealed Air bubble wrap when shipping the trophy; none of that Chinese knockoff crap. I don't want anything to get broken in transit.
-Mike
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Mike Atlas, Sacks on the Beach Owner)

item.title: seriously
item.description: Every freaking time I make the playoffs, my entire team takes the day off. Thanks for nothing jerks.
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Tim Shoobridge, LBC Co-owner)

item.title: Hubris is a bitch
item.description: the end.
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Tim Shoobridge, LBC Co-owner)

item.title: Thank you
item.description: Byron. I now have a lottery pick this year. Thanks!
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Tim Shoobridge, LBC Co-owner)

item.title: OUCH II: Electric Boogaloo
item.description: What the shit?! I guess my team is taking on the character of the team most represented on the roster: Tha Iggles. One week we lay an egg the next week we're stomping mudholes. Sounds like a Philly team to me.
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Warren Allen, Whiskey Tango)

item.title: Thankfully
item.description:
Adrian Peterson didn't end up beating me this week.
WOOHOO.
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Tim Shoobridge, LBC Co-owner)

item.title: OUCH.
item.description: That's gotta be some kind of record... At least for my franchise...

item.title: IT'S A FIRE SALE!
item.description: Make an offer.
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Tim Shoobridge, LBC Co-owner)

item.title: Damn Kickers
item.description:
So the Giants had the #1 ranked kicker in the league and inactivated him without putting it on the injury report, just because he's 90 years old.

At least it didn't cost me the game. The fact that the rest of my team sucks did that.
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Josh Utterback, Werewolves Owner)

item.title: The would be SOTB
item.description: Not the SOBs. Thanks Josh.
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Mike Atlas, Sacks on the Beach Owner)

item.title: If only I had a microphone to smack...
item.description: The Meggamen ARE who we THOUGHT they were! That's why we took the damn field! You want to crown them, CROWN THEIR ASSES! But they ARE who we thought they were, and we let them off the hook!
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Warren Allen, Whiskey Tango)

item.title: Thursday game?!?!
item.description: I'm glad I totally bricked. I might have pulled Eddie "Money" Royal. But yes, otherwise Gametime Activations++ !!!
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Warren Allen, Whiskey Tango)

item.title: Gametime Activations FTW
item.description: Thank God we implemented this rule for those who work 80hrs a week and forget there's a game on Thursday until 3am
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Jon Hall, Crusaders Owner)

item.title: Birds are Birds
item.description: I'm aware that the guy wearing a seattle seahawks helmet is not wearing an iggles helmet. however, he is still CLEARLY so stoked about his good fortune that it is only logical to assume he has iggles tickets. or perhaps a pair for game five of the world series.
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Warren Allen, Whiskey Tango)

item.title: those aren't eagles fans.
item.description: They're seattle fans. Almost as fair-weather as eagles fans.....almost.
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Tim Shoobridge, LBC Co-owner)

item.title: i WISH that was me...
item.description: ...he seems to have tickets to an Iggles game!

item.title: Quick! Someone trade me Cli'ton Portis!!!
item.description:
B-West: busted ankle and broken ribs.

Sammy Morris: 148 yards in one half; doesn't return to the game.

Who's next?
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Warren Allen, Whiskey Tango)

item.title: Consider it homage...
item.description:
As soon as I realized that I had to drop Ffrrerrotte I knew it would not go un-heckled. I mean, I could activate an old man with the arm strength of a barbie doll, or I could ditch him and play Brad Johnson instead.

Well I'm going to win by 53 points or more this week so bite me.
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Warren Allen, Whiskey Tango)

item.title: Tim=Stupid
item.description: Yup. It's true.

item.title: Smooth move, Mike. Genius, even.
item.description:

item.title: Bringing back the sexy!!!
item.description: Whiskey Tango f'na roll that doublewide straight back to the trophy!!! WOOT!!!

item.title: Back at .500
item.description: I am SHOCKED that I don't have a losing record. Hooray.
